title: COVID-19 Vaccine
author: Centre; Mental Health
cleaned_text: The CAMH COVID-19 Vaccine Clinic is now CLOSED. Staff, patients, and community members who would like to receive a vaccine can still do so at the CAMH Outpatient Pharmacy, which operates Monday to Friday, from 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM. Appointment booking requests and inquiries must be sent to [outpatient.pharmacy@camh.ca](mailto:outpatient.pharmacy@camh.ca). The pharmacy is located inside the Paul Christie Community Centre at our Queen Street Site.
